flawed_nl_solution:
Between Shop A and Shop B he buys 150 bottles+180 bottles=<<150+180=310>>310 bottles
Thus he can buy 550 bottles-310 bottles=<<550-310=240>>240 bottles from shop C

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 330, not 310. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
